select id, contest_id, contest_name, begin_time, length, create_time, update_time from cf_contest
contest_id like concat('%', #{contestId}, '%')
contest_name like concat('%', #{contestName}, '%')
begin_time like concat('%', #{beginTime}, '%')
order by begin_time desc

select id, contest_id, problem_id, problem_name, problem_rate, tag, url, create_time, update_time from cf_problem
contest_id like concat('%', #{contestId}, '%')
problem_id like concat('%', #{problemId}, '%')
problem_name like concat('%', #{problemName}, '%')
problem_rate like concat('%', #{problemRate}, '%')
tag like concat('%', #{tag}, '%')
order by contest_id desc
